summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS HAVE FAILED.  STARTED OFF BY WORKING INTERMITTENTLY BY CURRENTLY DO NOT WORK AT ALL!!  I SAW THE RECALL ON THE NEWS WHICH STATED GM IS RECALLING 1994-1997 TRUCKS, SUV'S AND VANS.  I CALLED THE DEALERSHIP WHO I BOUGHT THE CAR FROM AND THEY INFORMED ME THAT MY TRUCK WAS NOT COVERED EVEN THOUGH IT IS OBVIOUS THIS IS THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM SEVERAL OTHER PEOPLE HAVE EXPERIENCED.  IT IS RIDICULOUS THAT AN AMERICAN COMPANY WON'T LOOK OUT FOR THE PEOPLE BUYING THEIR PRODUCTS.   *NLM
